AUTH.INCORRECT_CREDENTIALS: Incorrect email or password, try again.
AUTH.NO_RESPONSE_FROM_SERVER: The server did not respond. Make sure you are connected to the internet or try again later.
AUTH.FORBIDDEN: Your account or IP address has been locked out for security reasons. Please try again in 24 hours or contact your support. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
AUTH.FATAL_ERROR: An error occurred which prevents the verification of your email and password.
AUTH.NO_CARER_APP_PERMISSION: Sorry, but you are not allowed to log in to this app. This app is only for carers.

RECOVER.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Please check your email for further instructions.
RECOVER.FAILURE_MESSAGE: There has been an connection error. Please try again.
